verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came also unto me saying

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תִקַּ֥ח <WH3947> Thou shalt not take לְךָ֖ אִשָּׁ֑ה <WH802> thee a wife וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יִהְי֤וּ <WH1961> have לְךָ֙ בָּנִ֣ים <WH1121> neither shalt thou have sons וּבָנ֔וֹת <WH1323> or daughters בַּמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

כִּי־ <WH3588> For כֹ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> concerning הַבָּנִים֙ <WH1121> concerning the sons וְעַל־ <WH5921> and concerning הַבָּנ֔וֹת <WH1323> and concerning the daughters הַיִּלּוֹדִ֖ים <WH3205> that are born בַּמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> in this place הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וְעַֽל־ <WH5921> concerning אִמֹּתָ֞ם <WH517> and concerning their mothers הַיֹּלְד֣וֹת <WH3205> that bare אוֹתָ֗ם <WH853> וְעַל־ <WH5921> concerning אֲבוֹתָ֛ם <WH1> them and concerning their fathers הַמּוֹלִדִ֥ים <WH3205> beget אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בָּאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> them in this land הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

מְמוֹתֵ֨י <WH4463> deaths תַחֲלֻאִ֜ים <WH8463> of grievous יָמֻ֗תוּ <WH4191> They shall die לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יִסָּֽפְדוּ֙ <WH5594> they shall not be lamented וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> or יִקָּבֵ֔רוּ <WH6912> neither shall they be buried לְדֹ֛מֶן <WH1828> [but] they shall be as dung עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> upon the face הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <WH127> of the earth יִֽהְי֑וּ <WH1961> will become וּבַחֶ֤רֶב <WH2719> by the sword וּבָֽרָעָב֙ <WH7458> and by famine יִכְל֔וּ <WH3615> and they shall be consumed וְהָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> will become נִבְלָתָם֙ <WH5038> and their carcases לְמַאֲכָ֔ל <WH3978> shall be meat לְע֥וֹף <WH5775> for the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> of heaven וּלְבֶהֱמַ֥ת <WH929> and for the beasts הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For כֹ֣ה ׀ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אַל־ <WH408> not תָּבוֹא֙ <WH935> Enter בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> not into the house מַרְזֵ֔חַ <WH4798> of mourning וְאַל־ <WH408> not תֵּלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> go לִסְפּ֔וֹד <WH5594> to lament וְאַל־ <WH408> not תָּנֹ֖ד <WH5110> nor bemoan לָהֶ֑ם כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָסַ֨פְתִּי <WH622> them for I have taken away אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁלוֹמִ֜י <WH7965> my peace מֵאֵ֨ת <WH853> הָעָ֤ם־ <WH5971> from this people הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֶ֖סֶד <WH2617> [even] lovingkindness וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָֽרַחֲמִֽים׃ <WH7356> and mercies

וּמֵ֨תוּ <WH4191> shall die גְדֹלִ֧ים <WH1419> Both the great וּקְטַנִּ֛ים <WH6996> and the small בָּאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> in this land הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יִקָּבֵ֑רוּ <WH6912> they shall not be buried וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יִסְפְּד֣וּ <WH5594> neither shall [men] lament לָהֶ֔ם <WH1992> like וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יִתְגֹּדַ֔ד <WH1413> for them nor cut וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יִקָּרֵ֖חַ <WH7139> themselves nor make themselves bald לָהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> like

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יִפְרְס֥וּ <WH6536> Neither shall [men] tear לָהֶ֛ם עַל־ <WH5921> in אֵ֖בֶל <WH60> [themselves] for them in mourning לְנַחֲמ֣וֹ <WH5162> to comfort עַל־ <WH5921> for מֵ֑ת <WH4191> them for the dead וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יַשְׁק֤וּ <WH8248> to drink אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> כּ֣וֹס <WH3563> neither shall [men] give them the cup תַּנְחוּמִ֔ים <WH8575> of consolation עַל־ <WH5921> anyone's אָבִ֖יו <WH1> for their father וְעַל־ <WH5921> or אִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH517> or for their mother

וּבֵית־ <WH1004> into the house מִשְׁתֶּ֥ה <WH4960> of feasting לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תָב֖וֹא <WH935> Thou shalt not also go לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> to sit אוֹתָ֑ם <WH854> for לֶאֱכֹ֖ל <WH398> with them to eat וְלִשְׁתּֽוֹת׃ <WH8354> and to drink ס

כִּי֩ <WH3588> For כֹ֨ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֜ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> I am going מַשְׁבִּ֜ית <WH7673> Behold I will cause to cease מִן־ <WH4480> at הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> out of this place הַזֶּ֛ה <WH2088> this לְעֵינֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5869> in your eyes וּבִֽימֵיכֶ֑ם <WH3117> and in your days ק֤וֹל <WH6963> the voice שָׂשׂוֹן֙ <WH8342> of mirth וְק֣וֹל <WH6963> and the voice שִׂמְחָ֔ה <WH8057> of gladness ק֥וֹל <WH6963> the voice חָתָ֖ן <WH2860> of the bridegroom וְק֥וֹל <WH6963> and the voice כַּלָּֽה׃ <WH3618> of the bride

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> become כִּ֤י <WH3588> now when תַגִּיד֙ <WH5046> And it shall come to pass when thou shalt shew לָעָ֣ם <WH5971> this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> all these words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these וְאָמְר֣וּ <WH559> and they shall say אֵלֶ֗יךָ <WH413> about עַל־ <WH5921> against מֶה֩ <WH4100> what דִבֶּ֨ר <WH1696> pronounced יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> unto thee Wherefore hath the LORD עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH5921> against אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָרָעָ֤ה <WH7451> evil הַגְּדוֹלָה֙ <WH1419> all this great הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> us וּמֶ֤ה <WH4100> and what עֲוֹנֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH5771> is our iniquity וּמֶ֣ה <WH4100> what חַטָּאתֵ֔נוּ <WH2403> is our sin אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which חָטָ֖אנוּ <WH2398> that we have committed לַֽיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> against the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> angels

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> Then shalt thou say אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> about עַל֩ <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after עָזְב֨וּ <WH5800> have forsaken אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֤ם <WH1> unto them Because your fathers אוֹתִי֙ <WH853> נְאֻם־ <WH5002> me saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיֵּלְכ֗וּ <WH1980> along אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> after אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> other וַיַּעַבְד֖וּם <WH5647> and have served וַיִּשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ <WH7812> them and have worshipped לָהֶ֑ם וְאֹתִ֣י <WH853> עָזָ֔בוּ <WH5800> them and have forsaken וְאֶת־ <WH853> תּוֹרָתִ֖י <WH8451> my law לֹ֥א <WH3808> not שָׁמָֽרוּ׃ <WH8104> me and have not kept

וְאַתֶּ֛ם <WH859> you הֲרֵעֹתֶ֥ם <WH7489> worse לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> And ye have done מֵאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1> than your fathers וְהִנְּכֶ֣ם <WH2005> behold הֹלְכִ֗ים <WH1980> ye walk אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> every one אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> after שְׁרִר֣וּת <WH8307> the imagination לִבּֽוֹ־ <WH3820> heart הָרָ֔ע <WH7451> of his evil לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> without שְׁמֹ֥עַ <WH8085> that they may not hearken אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> about

וְהֵטַלְתִּ֣י <WH2904> Therefore will I cast אֶתְכֶ֗ם <WH853> מֵעַל֙ <WH5921> and הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> you out of this land הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise עַל־ <WH5921> into הָאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> into a land אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יְדַעְתֶּ֔ם <WH3045> that ye know אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you וַאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1> not [neither] ye nor your fathers וַעֲבַדְתֶּם־ <WH5647> and there shall ye serve שָׁ֞ם <WH8033> and there אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהִ֤ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִים֙ <WH312> other יוֹמָ֣ם <WH3119> day וָלַ֔יְלָה <WH3915> and night אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no אֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> where I will not shew לָכֶ֖ם חֲנִינָֽה׃ <WH2594> you favour ס

לָכֵ֛ן <WH3651> Therefore הִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> behold יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> Therefore behold the days בָּאִ֖ים <WH935> come נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> will no יֵאָמֵ֥ר <WH559> that it shall no more be said עוֹד֙ <WH5750> longer חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> The LORD אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> who הֶעֱלָ֛ה <WH5927> that brought up אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> But The LORD אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who הֶעֱלָ֜ה <WH5927> that brought up אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> from the land צָפ֔וֹן <WH6828> of the north וּמִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> all הָֽאֲרָצ֔וֹת <WH776> and from all the lands אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הִדִּיחָ֖ם <WH5080> whither he had driven שָׁ֑מָּה <WH8033> in it וַהֲשִֽׁבֹתִים֙ <WH7725> them and I will bring them again עַל־ <WH5921> to their own אַדְמָתָ֔ם <WH127> into their land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> that I gave לַאֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <WH1> unto their fathers ס

הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> I am going שֹׁלֵ֜חַ <WH7971> Behold I will send [לְדַוָּגִים כ] (לְדַיָּגִ֥ים <WH1771> fisherman ק) רַבִּ֛ים <WH7227> for many נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD וְדִיג֑וּם <WH1770> and they shall fish וְאַֽחֲרֵי־ <WH310> them and after כֵ֗ן <WH3651> after that אֶשְׁלַח֙ <WH7971> will I send לְרַבִּ֣ים <WH7227> for many צַיָּדִ֔ים <WH6719> hunters וְצָד֞וּם <WH6679> and they shall hunt מֵעַ֤ל <WH5921> from כָּל־ <WH3605> every הַר֙ <WH2022> them from every mountain וּמֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> and every גִּבְעָ֔ה <WH1389> and from every hill וּמִנְּקִיקֵ֖י <WH5357> and out of the holes הַסְּלָעִֽים׃ <WH5553> of the rocks

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For עֵינַי֙ <WH5869> For mine eyes עַל־ <WH5921> are on כָּל־ <WH3605> all דַּרְכֵיהֶ֔ם <WH1870> [are] upon all their ways לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor נִסְתְּר֖וּ <WH5641> they are not hid מִלְּפָנָ֑י <WH6440> from my face וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor נִצְפַּ֥ן <WH6845> hid עֲוֹנָ֖ם <WH5771> neither is their iniquity מִנֶּ֥גֶד <WH5048> from עֵינָֽי׃ <WH5869> mine eyes

וְשִׁלַּמְתִּ֣י <WH7999> I will recompense רִֽאשׁוֹנָ֗ה <WH7223> And first מִשְׁנֵ֤ה <WH4932> double עֲוֹנָם֙ <WH5771> their iniquity וְחַטָּאתָ֔ם <WH2403> and their sin עַ֖ל <WH5921> because חַלְּלָ֣ם <WH2490> because they have defiled אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצִ֑י <WH776> my land בְּנִבְלַ֤ת <WH5038> with the carcases שִׁקּֽוּצֵיהֶם֙ <WH8251> of their detestable וְתוֹעֲב֣וֹתֵיהֶ֔ם <WH8441> and abominable things מָלְא֖וּ <WH4390> they have filled אֶת־ <WH853> נַחֲלָתִֽי׃ <WH5159> mine inheritance ס

יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> O LORD עֻזִּ֧י <WH5797> my strength וּמָעֻזִּ֛י <WH4581> and my fortress וּמְנוּסִ֖י <WH4498> and my refuge בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day צָרָ֑ה <WH6869> of affliction אֵלֶ֗יךָ <WH413> to you גּוֹיִ֤ם <WH1471> the Gentiles יָבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> shall come מֵֽאַפְסֵי־ <WH657> unto thee from the ends אָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְיֹאמְר֗וּ <WH559> and shall say אַךְ־ <WH389> nothing שֶׁ֙קֶר֙ <WH8267> lies נָחֲל֣וּ <WH5157> have inherited אֲבוֹתֵ֔ינוּ <WH1> Surely our fathers הֶ֖בֶל <WH1892> vanity וְאֵֽין־ <WH369> of no בָּ֥ם מוֹעִֽיל׃ <WH3276> and [things] wherein [there is] no profit
הֲיַעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> make לּ֥וֹ אָדָ֖ם <WH120> Shall a man אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> gods וְהֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> like לֹ֥א <WH3808> are not אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> gods

לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> Therefore הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> behold מֽוֹדִיעָ֔ם <WH3045> cause them to know בַּפַּ֣עַם <WH6471> Therefore behold I will this once הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> them אוֹדִיעֵ֥ם <WH3045> I will cause them to know אֶת־ <WH853> יָדִ֖י <WH3027> mine hand וְאֶת־ <WH853> גְּבֽוּרָתִ֑י <WH1369> and my might וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> and they shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that שְׁמִ֥י <WH8034> that my name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> [is] The LORD ס
